description: The protagonist accidentally ejaculates on Nanami’s smartphone, fearing he’s angered her, but instead, they start an intense sex session. Using her curvy body, Nanami challenges him to continue, milking him for all he’s worth. When they run out of condoms, she provokes him even more, leading him to focus on her sensitive spots. They end up having sex with maid cosplay, and during a package delivery, they engage in an extremely passionate encounter, culminating in internal ejaculation in both her ample backside and sensitive vagina.
